plot: The story of a oil truck driver and his adventures when he takes his oil truck on a 2000km journey through 5 provinces in China.
title: The Road to South

plot_en: The story of a oil truck driver and his adventures when he takes his oil truck on a 2000km journey through 5 provinces in China.
